name: Ninja's World
intro: A ninja adventure game integrating PVE, PVP and GVG
introduce: Ninja’s World is an Ninja adventure GameFi 2.0 integrating PVE, PVP, GVG (guild vs guild) . Instead of turn-by-turn or “attack and defend” styled games, players will engage in dynamic battles in real time. Players are engaged to squad up and adventure out to complete daily tasks and compete in arena matches to earn tokens.
